WindowServer(8) BSD System Manager's Manual WindowServer(8)

NAME

WindowServer - Window management, compositing, and event routing daemon.

SYNOPSIS

NONE (launched by launchd)

DESCRIPTION

WindowServer is a system daemon that provides various UI services such as window management, content compositing, and event routing. It is not user-invoked, nor does it have any options.
